title: Looking for cool people to play normals with ^_^
body:
I came back to the game a couple weeks ago and I would like to play more but would prefer to do it with a party of people (Or even just one adc *nudge nudge*). 
In game name: Kimiya
I also have discord and would love to chat with people while we play ^_^ Hope to hear from you!
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body: Add me iv been playing since the beta. Im Terrible, but still love the  game.
ill play man, love to meet new people an have a blast{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Add me too, i main {{champion:67}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:498}}  i also enjoy {{champion:16}} adc :)
Add me, I main MF atm xx
